hello.title: Hello
hello.description: Mohammad Salehi, I've been professionally pursuing web programming for nearly 6 years.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: I started learning programming about 9 years ago, and for the past 6 years, I've focused intensively on JavaScript and React. I have experience working both in-person and, more frequently, remotely.

rayan.note: Long-term, very part-time, and freelance collaboration

ainfluencer.note: Support for existing code and implementation of new features

thirdly.note: Building new projects and collaborating on a large project

other.title: Other
list: I've worked a little with Express.JS and a bit more with Django on the backend.
I learned data structures, algorithms, and design patterns to the extent of university courses (though it's been almost 7 years).
I am familiar with AI helper tools.

tooltip.text: The message will be sent anonymously to my Telegram, if you want me to contact back provide a contact info
